from math import log

n, k = map(int, input().split())
print(int(log(n, k)) + 1)

# get input
n, k = map(int, input().split())

# initialize
digits = 0

# iterate until n is 0
while n > 0:
    # increment digit count
    digits += 1
    # divide by k
    n //= k

# print result
print(digits)

# get input
n, k = map(int, input().split())

# initialize
digits = 0

# iterate until n is 0
while n > 0:
    # increment digit count by 1
    digits += 1
    # divide by k
    n //= k

# print result
print(digits)

from math import log

n, k = map(int, input().split())
print(int(log(n, k)) + 1) 

from math import log10

n, k = map(int, input().split())
print(int(log10(n) / log10(k)) + 1)
